text: Kevin John Conway (May 29, 1942 – February 5, 2020) was an American actor and film director. He was born in New York City. Conway was known for his roles in Gettysburg, Thirteen Days and Invincible. Conway died on February 5, 2020, of a heart attack in New York City, aged 77.Kevin Conway Dies: ‘Gettysburg’, ‘Thirteen Days’ & ‘Invincible’ Actor Was 77 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Kevin Conway (actor)
